casebody.data:
VOGLER REYNOLDA ROAD, LLC
v.
SCI NORTH CAROLINA FUNERAL SERVICES, INC. 312A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 29, 2017 Anthony T. Lathrop, Attorney at Law, Glenn E. Ketner, III, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for SCI North Carolina Funeral Services, Inc. John M. Martin, Attorney at Law, Mary V. Cavanagh, Attorney at Law, Winterville, for Vogler Reynolda Road, LLC.

John M. Martin, Attorney at Law, Winterville.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of December 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of December 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 23rd day of January 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
